Section.title: Welcome to our restaurant
Section.description: Twins Restaurant is a charming place located near the Poland's largest amusement park - Energylandia in Zator. Italian cuisine, delicious pizza, traditional Polish accents and juicy burgers - you will not miss these items in our menu. Spacious air-conditioned room, cozy terrace, modern decor and professional service serving fresh dishes will surely make your moments.

Party.description: Organize a special occasion party at Twins Restaurant! We will do our best to make your family celebration or corporate meeting special. Spacious, modern and air-conditioned restaurant room, professional and flexible approach and delicious food guaranteed.  You are cordially invited!
